channel.title: Network Addon Mod on
channel.description: Recent content in Network Addon Mod on

item.title: Download the NAM
item.description: Compatibility Warning - EA App and Origin Copies of SimCity 4 Deluxe This mod is NOT compatible with the EA App/Origin editions of SimCity 4 Deluxe (as sold on EA.com, and also available via EA play and Xbox Game Pass). Do NOT run other versions of SimCity 4 Deluxe (i.e. Steam or GOG) with the EA App or its background processes running, as it is CAPABLE OF SILENTLY UNPATCHING STEAM AND GOG COPIES OF THE GAME, MAKING THEM INCOMPATIBLE.
